response.answer_text: MIS is management information system and it is very important for all organisations to maintain data in appropriate manner in order to use the data in the time of need. MIS is done by various methods ranging from simple excel, Access, VBA, SQL . One can learn all this and can get very good job option across the world. There are various places from where we can learn the same and one such very nice institute is www.bpaeducators.com.

MIS stands for Masters of Science in Information systems or Management in Information systems. Each of these differs from the university which you are applying to. All I can say is about what exactly is Information Systems. Information Systems play an integral role in organizations. They enable business transactions, from Customer Relationship Management to Supply Chain Management, they provide crucial decision-making information for managers, and enable new types of business models and organization structures. Today’s information-intensive, complex business environment demands professionals who have both applied IT experience and management insight. Hope this helps.
